channel.title: Project Eagle Claw
channel.description:
[size=14pt][font=arial black]Project Eagle Claw[/font][/size] [IMG]http://i1001.photobucket.com/albums/af137/mousedude20/blue_box-4.png[/img] I Am In Need Of Experienced Coders That Can Add Custom Items Into My Server Such As: 1.Godswords Stances 2.Dclaws 3.Vestas Longsword 4. SS And so on and so forth
Positions To Apply For:
Pro-Coder-must have 2-3 years of coding experience
Jr-Coder-must have 2-3 months of coding experience
Webclient Coder-must have coded at least 2 webclient (provide pics and referrals)
Client Coder-must have coded at least 1 client (provide pics and referrals)
Server Coder-must have knowledge in server sided coding
Beta Tester-must be reliable and trustworthy
Advise Council-Must Be Very Trustworthy And Providing Referrals From A Well Known Site As Being Helpful And Trustworthy
[code]What Position Are You Applying For? Why Are You Applying For This Position? Can You Be Trusted? Are You Hardworking? How Can You Make This Server/Client/Website Better? Why Should I Pick You? (no wise cracks) How Long Have You Been Doing What You Are Applying For? Show Me Some Of Your Work: Link To Referral(have the referral be a topic or something) What Is Your Age? What Is Your Email? What Is Your Favorite Color? [/code]
Some Pictures (of what you might be handling) [IMG]http://i1001.photobucket.com/albums/af137/mousedude20/whipspecial-1.jpg[/img] Need some help with specials...its works but its below...
[IMG]http://i1001.photobucket.com/albums/af137/mousedude20/Menu-1.jpg[/img] when you are employed your name will appear here :D (sorry about advertising, you cant really read it anyways)
[IMG]http://i1001.photobucket.com/albums/af137/mousedude20/runescape-theme-1.jpg[/img] I want this as the client and webclient background :D

item.title: Project Eagle Claw
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Liquid Magic:

Its just another arrogant kid wanting someone else to do the work for him/her.

I agree 100%. I do plan on helping him/her out with this.
But like I said, I have my own server to look after, if I get accepted, okay, if not, oh well.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Eagle Claw
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Hmm, how are you so sure? explain he might not have much time on his hands but still can work on it. it just might be… impossible

I’m sorry, but your reply makes no sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Eagle Claw
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:7, topic:363922”][quote author=RoidScape.Darkbb link=topic=460163.msg3367257#msg3367257 date=1286895763]
ok, id love to have a good server coder that could add whatever i would want…i am not like most of the idiots on here that do not know how to code for themselves, i just do not have anytime on my hands. As for hosting, idk yet…i need a trustworthy host, you will have to gain my trust somehow…please register at my website.
[/quote]
If that is the case, then basically you are implying of using the other developers or what? Plus if you don’t have the time, how are you going to run it in the first place?[/quote]

Its just another arrogant kid wanting someone else to do the work for him/her.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Eagle Claw
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

ok, id love to have a good server coder that could add whatever i would want…i am not like most of the idiots on here that do not know how to code for themselves, i just do not have anytime on my hands. As for hosting, idk yet…i need a trustworthy host, you will have to gain my trust somehow…please register at my website.

If that is the case, then basically you are implying of using the other developers or what? Plus if you don’t have the time, how are you going to run it in the first place?

item.title: Project Eagle Claw
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Alright, I’m down with this.
I’ll go right ahead and apply.

What Position Are You Applying For?
Pro Coder & Webclient Coder

Why Are You Applying For This Position?
Because I could use a little more experience with different types of server.

Can You Be Trusted?
Of course I can. I’d do nothing to your server unless asked.
I have my own server to look after anyways.

Are You Hardworking?
Very.

How Can You Make This Server/Client/Website Better?
Depending on the source, like Delta, PI, etc.
I have had 3 years of coding experience, and I can code very well.

Why Should I Pick You? (no wise cracks)
Because I’ve owned 4 previous servers and have had 3 years of experience.

How Long Have You Been Doing What You Are Applying For?
3 Years

Show Me Some Of Your Work:
A topic on MoparScape? Okay

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

What Is Your Age?
15

What Is Your Email?
Not To Open Public

What Is Your Favorite Color?
Unnecessary

Read full topic
